name: CUBE-C: VR Game Collection
description:
This is a Brand New, Fun, Casual VR Game! If your VR device is lying there for a long time, welcome to try CUBE-C, A game specially designed for VR.
Although there is no exquisite realistic scene and longtime gameplay here, hope the new experience will make you satisfied! (VIVE only, more VR devices support will be updated)

CUBE-C include 3 mini-games:

  • VR Cube World
  • 720° Racing
  • Pile Up VR

VR Cube World
Grab anything you can grab and throw it out,
Destroy anything you can destroy,
Everything will turn into CUBEs!
Three character status (VR hand shape), three different weapons, including - Cube, Fireball and... Lightsaber!!!
It may be a Children's paradise!
If CUBE-C can get enough support, I will add more fun weapons (｀・ω・´) and make some brand new maps.

720° Racing
Have you ever played a Mini 4WD?
If you have, then you can now experience how to drive it.
If you haven't, It's time to try(｡･ω･｡)!
If CUBE-C can get enough support, I will add more fun car skins, maps and network battle mod (｀・ω・´).

Pile Up VR
Play JENGA in a way you can't imagine(^・ω・^ )
If CUBE-C can get enough support, I will add more fun maps (｀・ω・´).

CUBE-C will soon release a beta version, it includes VR Cube World only(momo will personally send closed test qualification).

Author Statement:
This game is made by momo alone for nearly a year and is still in early states. I try to improve the VR game experience and make it in an open, dynamic, fun, simple way. But because this is a personal developed VR game, there may be a variety of defects, hope every player that participated in the early test of the game can give me advice, help me improve the game.
